transcript:
Customer: Mere ko call kar rahe the.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi. Abhi aapka discussion ho raha tha na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir main actually aapko samjhana chah rahi thi aap Hyderabad mein deal karna chahte hain near about right?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan yes yes. Yes.
Executive: Sir Hyderabad agar aap Hyderabad mein deal karna chahte hain like example near by Vijayawada, Hyderabad, Guntur, Vishakhapatnam, Nillore and Krishna right? So agar is area mein aap apni visibility karana chahte hain to hamare kuch premium plans hain jo main aapke sath discuss karna chahungi. But wo cheeze aap jo unka jo budget hota hai depend on you ki aap kaun si services lena chahte ho. Like example aap hamare yahan se kis product ke upar zyada kaam kar rahe hain. Aap mujhe wo batayenge thoda sa ki aapko kaun se product ka set bechna hai kyunki ye kya hota hai sir product wise business hota hai. Theek hai inki costing hoti hai product category ke upar. Hum ek product ko aapke top 10 cities mein dikha sakte hain jaise example aapne bola aluminium sliding window. Theek hai? Ya phir example leti hu main aluminium office partitions. To aluminium office partition mein jo bhi business aayega hum log us category ko book kar denge sir aapke liye. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To usme jaise ki example koi bhi aluminium partition search karta hai near by I am telling you those city to aapki company ka wo naam wahan top par aayega. To obvious si baat hai jab upar naam dikhega like example Vishakhapatnam mein ya Vijayawada mein koi search karta hai Chennai mein koi search karta hai to aapki company wahan dikhegi and they people are sending you direct buyleads sir. Theek hai? To aapko jab direct call aur direct lead aayegi to definitely you will you know increase your business sir. To iski jo costing hoti hai ek keyword ki costing approx. Haan ji?
Customer: Actually mere ko puchna hai mam actually hello mere ko hello hello haan haan yes I can hear you. Aluminium partitions aluminium office partitions aisa mere ko dikh raha hai mere ko bhi aa rahe hain calls sir. But consume karne ke liye haan but consume karne ke liye.
Executive: That's the reason we will increase that. That is the reason we told you sir kyunki abhi kya hai aapke jo buyleads dekho sir you are depend only on buyleads right now ki buylead aayegi to business karunga right? Direct call aur direct inquiry to dikh hi nahi rahi na sir. To direct inquiry aur direct call ko jo hum increase kar sakte hain wo iske through hum increase kar sakte hain sir. That I have to explain you sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay wo wo kidhar dikhna hai hum.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Wo kidhar dikhna hai dekhna hai ye ye buyleads consume karne ka nahi.
Executive: Sir main aapko main batati hu. Sir aap ek bar Google pe daliye aluminium office partitions supplier.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Are you on system are you on phone?
Customer: Phone phone.
Executive: Phone pe hain aap system nahi hai aapke paas desktop laptop and all?
Customer: Present nahi hai mam main bahar hai nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha koi nahi sir main aapko batati hu agar aap search karte hain to we can see some company here. First company I can see Gautam Glass Incorporation from Hyderabad Shankar Bagh from there. Theek hai? This one 15 year of us with us sir. Second company I can see in this keyword that is Lucky Trader that also from Hyderabad Raniganj. Okay. This company belong to us with approximately from 11 years sir. Okay? The third company is Recon Build Blind sir. This is also from Hyderabad. The fourth company is Jagdamba Aluminium Works. I think you know these company.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap inko jante ho kisi ek ko bhi sir?
Customer: Haan janta hu suna suna hmm.
Executive: Right? To aap socho sir these people also take this package jisse ki inki jo listing hai inke area ke according plans sir. Inko iske through business milne se sir sabse pehle inke paas lead jati hai sir. To inko direct business milne se inka jo response hai wo maturity level badh jata hai sir. Okay? To agar aap ye lete ho to sir definitely you will also increase your business sir. Iski jo cost hoti hai agar aap ek single keyword ke liye minimum do keyword aap le sakte ho sir. Iske ek single keyword ki cost approximately ₹1,20,000 hoti hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: For a year sir. To ₹1,20,000 ki ek costing hogi to do costing aapki jo hogi approximately ₹2 lakh ki hoti hai sir. ₹2 lakh ₹2,20,000 ki sir. To uske andar agar aapko business karte hain to sir usme jo hai aapka jo hai business ROI sara achcha hota hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Yes. Agar aap karoge to aapka business kar sakta hai.
Customer: Ek keyword ₹1 lakh.
Executive: Haan ek keyword ka ₹1,20,000 sir lekin discount karke wo ₹1 lakh ka padta hai sir to do keyword agar aap lete ho like example aluminium office partitions aluminium partition work ye dono keyword agar aapko padenge sir aluminium partition work bhi to ye dono keyword aapko ₹1,70,000 ke andar pad jayenge plus GST sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Yes. Theek hai theek hai aisa hai to agar aap isme interested hai to aap batao main aapko.
Customer: Ya actually idhar main Vijayawada aur Andhra Pradesh mein sabhi bech raha hu 35000 ke MDC mein MDC mein.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Hmm same MDC Hyderabad mein nahi milega mere ko?
Executive: Nahi sir MDC ke andar ye cheeze nahi milti hai MDC pan India ke liye hota hai sir. Aapko har jagah se business aayega usme.
Customer: Okay okay okay only one one keyword ke liye hai to.
Executive: Nahi sir minimum aapko do keyword lene padte hain. Sir minimum aapko do keywords lene padte hain. Jin bhi do keywords jo aapke two keywords hot product hote hain sir aap wo keywords book karaye to you will get those keyword direct inquiry and buyleads both sir.
Customer: Wo wo keyword ke liye keh rahe the mere ko aata hai ya nahi mere ko kaise malum padega wo sabhi nahi jaata hai na wo keyword.
Executive: Nahi sir wo hum aapko pura denge isiliye main aapko bol rahi hu ek kaam karte hain ek main aapko na video meeting ke pura demo deti hu kaise ye kaam karta hai then you will understand ki haan I have to take it or not sir. To aap mujhe batao aap system pe laptop ke desktop pe kis time available honge sir?
Customer: Main Monday main gaon mein nahi hai present dusra gaon pe hai system.
Executive: Vijay garu.
Customer: Ee system open unda? Aa undi.
Executive: Aa theek hai ek aapko internet? Net net ledu ga? Net ledu ga? Kaavalante set roju connect chesta.
Customer: Aa? Internet connect chesta.
Executive: Nayya mam present available nayya Monday hai to.
Executive: Theek hai sir Monday ya Tuesday kabhi aap apne ghar pahuchenge aap mujhe bata dijiyega we will definitely talk to you on the same time theek hai sir? Aur aap ek bar please connect.
Customer: Video meeting mein.
Executive: Haan main video bhejungi nahi sir video meeting pe aapko guide karungi. Theek hai? Kaise kaise dikhta hai kya hota hai to Monday aapko kitne connect karu main aapko?
Customer: Sir Monday kitne connect karu aapko? Ye ye ye ₹1 lakh ₹2 lakh hai to zyada hai mam ₹1 lakh ₹2 lakh to utna business aata hai.
Executive: Business bhi usi ke according hota hai sir business bhi usi ke according aap ek kaam karna aap investment mat karna aap pehle dekh lena product kaise work karta hai uske baad jis bhi company ko aap jante ho ek bar unhe call kar lena sir unse feedback le lena sir theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Phir aap investment ki sochiyega sir. I am not saying that you will invest the money sir. First you have to understand what product we are. Sir thoda do din do din teen din trial period rehta hai na kuch dekhne ke liye.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir trial period nahi hota hai I understand.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: But there is no trial period sir I am so sorry for that sir.
Customer: ₹2 lakh ₹1 lakh aisa to kitna ek bar aap keyword dekho main wo keyword mein aap kitna hota hai mere ko bata dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko Monday connect karti hu aur abhi na mere paas ek aapka na complaint open hua tha to main wo close kar rahi hu aapke paas feedback jayega please if you are satisfied with my conversation give me a positive feedback sir okay?
Customer: Okay. Theek hai.
Executive: Thank you so much I will connect Monday at 11 o'clock is it okay for you?
Customer: Okay mam.
Executive: Okay sir thank you sir have a nice day sir. Good night.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about keyword pricing.

- Enquired about trial period.

- Wants to know how keywords work.



Resolution:

- Explained about premium plans and keyword benefits.

- Explained that there is no trial period.

- Executive offered a video meeting demo.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on Monday for video demo.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- keywords, business, visibility, mdc, buyleads
